__e: I have waited for you so long, but only you can now decide your own fate.
This man you love, ooh, he's been waiting for you for a long time.
I been waiting a few years for this, and I think that's probably one of the sweetest moments that we've had in a very long time.
I have been waiting for this as much as you.
You... you have no idea how much I've been looking forward to this.
This man that I had waited for, for 33 months, and then he comes home and I don't really know him.
She went one way and I went the other, and ever since then I've been...
And I know, because all my life I've been waiting for someone like you.
My entire life, I have longed for what you have.
And you said that life doesn't always turn out the way you expect. Which is right... but...
When you say "better than expected," what did you mean by that?
And I have to do what is expected of me.
No-one can be expected to do their job properly with this hanging over them.
Don't you know what is expected of you now?
That was something I've been wanting to do for quite some time.
You know, I think you could have waited for the weekend when we weren't here.
You don't know how long I have waited to get you right where I have you.
I guess I shouldn't have expected it to be here still.
I'm not expected to do anything with anyone, am I?
What happened was enough. Just--Just needed to stop. I shouldn't have expected it to work.
Oh, I knew I should've waited till I met the rest of the family... before I made my choice.
And while I waited until the winter of my life to see the things I've seen this past year there is no doubt I would have waited too long had it not been for you.
Except I wish I had found out if he was a good man, is all.
